name: Linear API
description: Linear GraphQL API — issues, projects, teams, cycles, and more. Auth is handled automatically via the LINEAR_API_KEY environment variable. All requests are GraphQL queries sent as POST to https://api.linear.app/graphql. Includes a poll ingestor that periodically fetches recently updated issues — use poll_events to retrieve them.

body.query: { issues(orderBy: updatedAt, first: 50) { nodes { id identifier title state { name } priority updatedAt createdAt assignee { name } } } }

testIngestor.description: Executes a minimal GraphQL query to verify Linear API access

listenerConfig.name: Linear Poll Listener
listenerConfig.description: Polls Linear for recently updated issues at a configurable interval.

fields.label: Poll Interval (ms)
fields.description: How often to check for new events, in milliseconds.

fields.label: Buffer Size
fields.description: Maximum number of events to keep in memory.

testConnection.description: Fetches the authenticated user via GraphQL
